author: Jacob Dressler
description:
One Marvel star has confirmed that they’re done with the MCU, the long-running superhero franchise, and that they don’t have plans to reprise their roles. Their statement comes as fans continue to ask about their potential return and whether or not they can expect to see it happen with Avengers: Doomsday. The new Avengers movie [...]

The post Marvel Actor Doubles Down On Being Done With MCU appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Marvel Actor Doubles Down On Being Done With MCU
